problem.markdown:
>>X is a random variable which is uniformly distributed between 13 and 17. What is the probability that 14 \(\leq\) X \(\leq\) 15.5? (Enter 3 decimal places)<<
= 0.375+-0.003

numericalresponse.label: X is a random variable which is uniformly distributed between 13 and 17. What is the probability that 14 \(\leq\) X \(\leq\) 15.5? (Enter 3 decimal places)
